question_text:
Choose the correct answer 

Statements:

Some Ships are Boats.

All Boats are Submarines.

Some Submarines are Yachts.



Conclusion:

I. Some Yachts are Boats.

II. Some Submarines are Boats.

III. Some Submarines are Ships.

IV. Some Yachts are Ships.



Choices:

1- All follow

2- Only II and III follow

3- Only III follows

4- Only IV follows
